Package de.engehausen.treemap.examples.swt

Examples on how to use the tree map for SWT.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FileViewer
    Sample application using a tree map to show file sizes starting at a given directory.
    FilterDialog
    Color dialog used in FileViewer which allows to map colors to file names and directory names based on regular expressions (see Pattern).
    Scientific
    Very simple demo of the treemap widget using a model that uses BigDecimal weights.
    Simple
    Very simple demo of the treemap widget.
    SimpleBorder
    A very simple example of a tree map layout using the BorderRenderer.
    SimpleCushion
    A very simple example of a tree map layout using the CushionRectangleRenderer.

Package de.engehausen.treemap.examples.swt Description

Examples on how to use the tree map for SWT. This package contains three very basic examples:
  • Simple
  • SimpleBorder
  • SimpleCushion
Additionally a more complex "file viewer" example is provided; you may be reminded of Sequioa View.

Finally, the "scientific" treemap Scientific using BigDecimal is shown, which demonstrates the use of GenericSquarifiedLayout and GenericTreeModelEx which may have to be used when the (better performing) standard version using long weights cannot be used.
